main.name: Carlos Rivera
main.occupation: Self-taught Full Stack Developer, Customer Experience Specialist and Certified Associate Project Manager
main.description1: Making the world a better place, one line of code at a time.
main.description2: Helping people and building lasting relationships is my passion!
main.bio: Empathetic and committed leader with 2+ years of healthcare and benefits experience, 8+ years of customer support expertise and 2+ years of leadership experience. Capable of leveraging my experience and technical skills to build lasting relationships by approaching problems from multiple perspectives to achieve a thorough grasp of customer needs. Motivated to learn new skills while adapting quickly to new and fast paced environments. I'm currently interested in joining a talented team to learn and grow alongside them while I continue to develop my professional career. Check out my Github portfolio and LinkedIn above to know more about me.
